reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute with adorable puffy sleeves, made of thick fabric, and well-made, with one noting it feels more expensive than its price. The dress is comfortable, not scratchy, and flattering, with one customer highlighting how it hugs the waist and ribcage. While some it's true to size, others mention it runs very small. The dress receives mixed feedback about its length, with some finding it a little short. One customer notes that the waist is sinched in, while another mentions it sits about mid-thigh. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!
items.body: The dress is exactly as pictured good quality! The way it hugs your waist and ribcage makes it really flattering. The material is stretchy yet thicker so it feels really durable and also obscures any insecurities! It's very cute and great for fall/winter. Fits true to size. Small: 135lbs and 5'5 Read more
items.author: Natalia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful expensive looking dress
items.body: so stunning and fits beautifully. the material has the perfect amount of stretch. it fits as if it was tailored and looks and feels far more expensive than it is. Read more
items.author: KTurn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size up when buying! Tummy control/corset waist look! great alternative for thick/plus size!
items.body: Cute dress, but the sizing and fit is not accurate. Size up! If you are going to buy. Not see through at all and super stretchy and comfortable/relaxed fit. In between thickness? Enough to keep you warm while wearing but not overly warm. Neutral color that fits with a variety of outfits which I like. No matter what the sizing is the collar is super loose fitting. And the sleeves can be too big/long in length. I bought two versions a Large and an extra large (the one I kept). The large (my usual size) was a few inches shorter in length. But the sleeves were the perfect length and form fitting look. Fits more like a medium/small, super tight and form fitting in an uncomfortable way. And the neck/collar part was too big and had a gap in the neck part while wearing. Only issue with the XL is the sleeves are too big? They could be smaller in size, they fall down easily over my hands. While not perfect it’s a cute dress! The stretchiness makes it great if you are plus/bigger size. And the balloon sleeves and dress flow are flattering. The waist has a cinched corset type look that makes you look snatched. And the fabric does a good job at hiding your tummy. I’d give it 4/5 stars because of the sizing issues and inconsistent fit. Price point is a bit high to be having those issues. Read more
items.author: Genevieve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT!
items.body: I LOOOVEEE this dress! I think this is the most comfortable and most flattering dress I've ever bought (coming from someone who is extremely body conscious). I am 5"3' and 175~180 pounds and bought the XL. I don't have a big chest but I do have a broad back and this fits extremely well. The fabric has a slight stretch to it and is so nice and soft. I usually have a hard time with tops that button at the back of the neck but it was very roomy and comfortable, where closures like that normally make me feel like I'm being choked. Only thing is yes, it is very short, the bottom of the dress literally is aligned with the bottom of my butt lol. You'll definitely need leggings with this. But otherwise I really love this dress so so much. Very flattering for someone who has a hard time dressing their larger body. **belt was purchased separately, does not come with the dress** Read more
items.author: Sora

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but...
items.body: I really wanted to like this dress. I love the capped sleeves and the length of the skirt. The material is quality, and the waist is structured so it gives a nice shape. The pockets are a plus! The issue I have is at the back of the neck - the dress doesn't sit flush with the body. it pokes out really bad. I returned it. Read more
items.author: MoMo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: Great quality, cool cut. Always get compliments on this one Read more
items.author: Emily Brumit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST mini dress!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE this dress. I was worried because of some reviews that I read, but decided to take the risk. To start, I am 6 feet tall and about 190lbs. The quality is very nice. I wouldn’t say the fabric is thick, but very good quality. It is not see through at all, and it does have a decent amount of weight to it. The dress is tailored PERFECTLY. the waist lands exactly where it’s supposed to, which is always hard to find, being a tall woman. I love the idea of a skort, so I did wear very short black shorts under this, along with black nylons. If you don’t wear something underneath and you bend over, you’re gonna flash someone. Lol. It IS short, but that was the whole reason I wanted it. I’d say it goes about 1/4 to 1/3 down my thigh. Overall I am so pleased with the dress, and basically got an entire NICE outfit for $30. You can’t beat that! Read more
items.author: Emily Sena

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very cute and comfortable
items.body: absolutely adorable, I got so many compliments while out wearing this Read more
items.author: Kayla

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray Grid. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.
